member.name: T:Fusion.CompareOperator
member.summary: Comparison method for evaluating condition member value against compareToValues.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.Equal
member.summary: if condition member value equals compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.NotEqual
member.summary: if condition member value is not equal to compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.Less
member.summary: if condition member value is less than compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.LessOrEqual
member.summary: if condition member value is less than or equal to compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.GreaterOrEqual
member.summary: if condition member value is greater than or equal to compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.Greater
member.summary: if condition member value is greater than compareToValue.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.NotZero
member.summary: Returns if the condition member evaluates to anything other than zero. In the case of object references, this means for any non- value.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.IsZero
member.summary: Returns if the condition member evaluates to zero. In the case of object references, this means for any value.

member.name: F:Fusion.CompareOperator.BitwiseAndNotEqualZero
member.summary: Returns if the bitwise AND of the condition member and compareToValue is not zero.

member.summary: Is this instance a global instance.

member.summary: If the current instance is global, unsets and calls

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObject`1.GlobalInternal
member.summary: A singleton instance-like property. Loads or returns the current global instance. Derived classes can package it in a property with a different name. Throws if loading an instance failed.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObject`1.IsGlobalLoadedInternal
member.summary: Returns true if a global instance is loaded. Compared to , it does not attempt to load an instance.

member.summary: Loads or returns the current global instance. Returns if loading an instance failed.

member.summary: Unloads the global instance if it is loaded.

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObjectSourceAttribute
member.summary:
Base class for all attributes that can be used to load . Attributes need to be registered at the assembly level. For instance, this snippet is used to register a default loader, that attempts to load from Resources based on :
[assembly: Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObjectResource(typeof(Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObject), Order = 2000, AllowFallback = true)]

member.summary: Type or the base type of that this loader supports.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObjectSourceAttribute.Order
member.summary: Order in which this loader will be executed. Lower values are executed first.

member.summary: Can this loader be used in edit mode.

member.name: P:Fusion.FusionGlobalScriptableObjectSourceAttribute.AllowFallback
member.summary: Does this loader allow fallback to the next loader?

member.summary: Attempt to load the object of the specified type. Return if the object cannot be loaded.
